H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H3096.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Reuben<SDBH:רְאוּבֵן>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Merari<SDBH:מְרָרִי>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; later occupied by {L:Moab<SDBH:מֹואָב>}

H6932.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Reuben<SDBH:רְאוּבֵן>}, east of the {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}, north of the {L:Arnon<SDBH:אַרְנֹון>}; ► former territory of {L:Amorites<SDBH:אֱמֹרִי>}; assigned to clan of {L:Merari<SDBH:מְרָרִי>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H4334.def: = an area of fairly level, high ground; ≈ sometimes associated with a lack of obstacles, both literally and figuratively

H4080.def: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons

H6698.def: = hard stony material ◄ that forms the crust of the earth, sometimes exposed on the surface, sometimes hidding under the soil; ≈ associated with hardness, permanence, and security

H2354.def: = white cloth; ◄ woven out of either linen or cotton; ► used for making clothes or to decorate the house; ≈ regarded as valuable and therefore symbolizing high status

H7254.def: = state in which an entity is one out of four equal parts

H5257.def: = action by which humans pour out a liquid, such as {L:wine<SDBH:יַיִן>}, {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, or even {L:blood<SDBH:דָּם>} before a deity ► as a sacrifice

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7080.def: = action by which humans communicate with the spirit world using a variety of means such as inspecting the liver of animals, shaking arrows, consulting teraphim, or casting lots; ≈ usually regarded as an evil practice that is to be condemned; responsibility of a prophet or king

H1109.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Beor<SDBH:בְּעֹור>}, from {L:Pethor<SDBH:פְּתֹור>}; ► a non-Israelite prophet or fortune-teller; ≈ the name became a symbol for attempts to deviate Israel from its divinely chosen path

H2026.def: = causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way

H2719.def: = sharp object; ◄ made out of iron or flint; ► used as tool for various purposes

H2491.def: = state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else
